message.body: happy friday kiddo
yes it is :-) any big plans for the weekend?
camp
I wasn't really thinking it, but apparently everyone else was, so there's gonna be a nice little crowd up there
sweet, like who?
that waterfall you took us to was so beautiful
my sis, buddy dan, cousin and his fam
I am hoping not do debate evolution this time :-/
hahhaa. Dan's off baby duty?

You probably already know this...but I am too busy/busier than I consciously would like to be. I hope you don't interpret that as a lack of deire to hang out. I am literally not doing anything besides school, work, renovation, and minimal dog care taking.
and time senitive things- hanging out with people going out of town, and little things - eating with parents
/gowtham
and sleeping on occasion I hope
oh yeah, I can't forgo sleep. I'm a total bitch when I miss sleep on a recurring basis
I'll keep that in mind
anything fun going on this weekend?
just everything I been doin.
head home from work soon...then grab a bit before I head to lowes to buy subflooring.
ahhhh, I'm making a trip to lowes myself this evening
It's like college all over again, except I'm cramming for rooms in the house, not exams.
and part of me wants to do this for some reason, where as I did college for my parents.
I think I prefer to work on other people's houses
lol. I feel a bit robotic. I don't think I have a preference between mine and others'
it doesn't feel like my house.
yeah, I feel that way about mine too sometimes
but I am the bottom line there....where as I almost hold myself to higher standards working on my parents place.
but at the same time, I know my word is not the final word, and if my mom says it's ok, then it's ok.
yeah, I think I like that aspect of working on someone else's place. I don't feel like I am responsible for decisions
but I'm still a control freak >.<
gowtham pissed me off the other day.
for the first time ever.
wow
he's a bit of a control freak himself.
not a good combo
hehe
lol.
what are you getting at lowes
a vanity top for the bathroom
you going with the granite you liked?
I looked at some yesterday at home depot but I prefer the one at lowes, plus I have a $10 coupon
yup, it's sharp. gonna set me back $168 though
oh well $10...you gotta go to lowes, lol
I might get the underfloor heating as well when I'm there
do you a br floor right now?
so you LIKE the granite huh? or do you think it will help the resale?
I do like it but yeah I think it's good for the resale
lol, it's pretty. but you didn't answer my question
nm yes you did
i'm confused, I thought granite didn't matter for resale? or wait...it doesn't matter for appraisal; it matters for resale. is that right?
doesnt matter for appraisal, but it's very popular and has a wow factor, that's why Im doing the counters in granite tile. I found some that have no bullnose, so the lines will be almost unnoticeable
yup, i'm with ya.
ok i'm outta here.
happy shopping
k, you too!
